Header: Central Troops Launch Dengue Prevention Projects
Content: Troops of 8 Gemunu Watch (GW) and 3 Sri Lanka National Guards (SLNG) of the 12 Division under the Security Force Headquarters - Central (SFHQ-Cen) carried out the Dengue prevention campaigns on the directions of Major General Ruwan De Silva and under the guidance  of the General Officer Commanding 12 Division. Accordingly, Okkampitiya District Hospital premises was cleaned by a team of six Army personnel including an  officer of 8 GW on 30 November and one Officer and 10 Other Ranks of 3 SLNG on Sunday (2) cleared the surroundings at Kataragama District Hospital premises in order to prevent any outbreak of this deadly virus.
